content.raw: I ran the script to stress test it for half an hour in this branch and also the same in drcsim_2.6. It seems like it resolves the problem of exerting strange force on Atlas when set pose is called. But I did not run into the `boost::math::round` exception problem during testing in drcsim_2.6.
content.html: I ran the script to stress test it for half an hour in this branch and also the same in drcsim_2.6. It seems like it resolves the problem of exerting strange force on Atlas when set pose is called. But I did not run into the boost::math::round exception problem during testing in drcsim_2.6.
